Reference

All functions

NIPALS_OPLS_component()

Calculating a single OPLS component

NIPALS_OPLS_component_mulitlevel()

Calculate PLS, orthogonalise X and remove orthogonal information

NIPALS_PCAcomponent()

Calculating a single PCA component

NIPALS_PLS_component()

Calculating a single PLS component

OPLS_MetaboMate-class

An S4 class to represent OPLS models

PCA_MetaboMate-class

An S4 class to represent PCA models

bariatric

Bariatric surgery data

bline()

Baseline correction for NMR spectra

calibration()

Spectral calibration to a chemical shift reference

center_scale()

Centering and scaling vectors or matrices

create_dummy_Y()

Create dummy matrix and check numeric variable for OPLS analysis

cv_sets_method()

Generate k cross-validation sets

dmodx()

Calculating distance to the model in X space

get.idx()

get indices of respective ppm values

lw()

Calculating full width at half max

matspec()

Plotting multiple NMR spectra

minmax()

Min-Max scaling

noise.est()

Estimation of noise level

opls()

Fitting Orthogonal-Partial Least Squares Models

opls.par()

Fitting Orthogonal-Partial Least Squares Models - parallelised

pca()

Perform Principal Component Analysis

plotload()

Plotting PCA or OPLS loadings

plotscores()

Plotting PCA, PLS or OPLS model scores

pls_prediction()

Predicting scores and Y outcome using PLS component(s)

pqn()

Probablistic quotient normalisation

readBruker()

Reading 1D NMR spectra from Bruker

spec()

Plotting a single NMR spectrum

spec.quality()

Calculating spectral quality indices

specOverlay()

Plotting overlayed NMR specra

specload()

Overlay PCA or OPLS loadings with spectra

specload1()

Overlay PCA or OPLS loadings with spectra - experimental

totSS()

Calculating Total Sum of Squares (TSS)

totalArea()

Total area normalisation
